### Understanding Digestive Health

Before delving into the specifics of the Digestive Health Institute Lansing's offerings, it is essential to understand what digestive health encompasses. Digestive health refers to the proper functioning of the gastrointestinal tract, which includes the stomach, intestines, and related organs. A well-functioning digestive system is vital for nutrient absorption, waste elimination, and maintaining overall health.

Common digestive issues include:

- Bloating
- Constipation
- Diarrhea
- Acid reflux
- Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)
